chunk:
Birch Babe Restoring Face Toner

Brand: Birch Babe

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: Distilled Water, Rosa Damascena Flower Water, *Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Distillate, *Apple Cider Vinegar, *Lavandula Hybrida (Lavender) Oil, *Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil.

Directions: Shake well. After cleansing spritz face 3-4 times. Apply Birch Babe Face Cream.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
